node.html: The application designed for Android facilitates task management, employing machine learning to generate schedules that optimize productivity.

Implement an RFID system at ENSIAS to detect student absences. Each student will have a badge that will be scanned at the beginning of each seance. Scanned badge data will be stored in a cloud AWS database.
Develop interfaces for efficiently managing team and match data for the World Cup. The data entered through these APEX interfaces will be utilized by a Web application.
Programming a simple X/O game using Java Swing, sockets, and threads.
Development of a web application for the management of internships for engineering students in various fields and levels at our school.
